content.detailedDescription:
i was in my kitchen, looking out the window facing the w/nw. (this was shortly after sunset, & the sky was just getting dark) i saw a red "fireball" that got my attention, which was similar to a flare being fired.    

  i went outside a few minutes later to look in the sky & see if any of my neighbors might be shooting fireworks or flares... there were no other "fireballs" that followed.

  i kept watching the sky, and was looking at the "big dipper". (which is almost perpendicular to the land horizon this time of year)
  at 8:45pm i saw a thick, white, "flash/streak" of light "shoot" through the center of the "cup" of the dipper.  it came in from behind the "handle" & traveled between the 4 stars that make up the "cup"..... (megrez, phecda, merak, & dubhe.)

  it was a perfectly centered path through the cup, & was 1/2 the width, or thickness of it. 
 (if you were to scale the cup of the big dipper at let's say, 4 inches deep, the "flash/streak" would be 2 inches thick, by 4-6 inches long, & split the center perfectly, leaving an inch on both sides.)

  the "object"/flash/ was not a bright streak like a meteor, but was more of a "beam", or "pulse".
it was faint but clearly visible.  i'd say the brightness could be compared to the glow of the milky way on a good clear night.

  it was a quick pulse, lasting about a second or just under, & then was gone.   

  it reminded me of the "flash" & "beam/contrails" of the 1991 space shuttle discovery video "sts 48" .....
  ...Where an "object" is seen coming over earth's horizon moving in a straight direction..... & then in the lower left corner of the screen a noticeable "flash" occurs, which causes the "object" (along with a couple others) to suddenly change directions at a 90 degree angle & accelerate outward away from earth.  immediately following the mysterious flash, there are 2 "beams/pulses/contrails" that are visible speeding toward the direction of the main object that rose up over the earth horizon.

  the "flash/pulse" i saw go through the big dipper, was very similar to the ones that appear to be "fired" at the mystery object in the sts 48 video.

  this was unlike any other "ufo" sightings i've seen, & don't feel that it was a craft of any sort.... but then again, i just don't know.

-mark
content.summary: Thick "flash / streak" of white light passed through the big dipper

content.detailedDescription: It was late in the evening when my step son and his friends were running around outside. he came in the house and said he saw lights in the sky. i did not believe him.  this morning i was down loading old pics off the digital camera and found tis photo. i thought you should see it.
content.summary: My son said he saw lights in thsky and took this picture with a digital camera. i just found the photo.

content.detailedDescription: My son (10 at the time)and i were at a boy scout jamboree/campout. it was held at the rutland state fairgrounds. during a storm, high winds started to uproot tents and everyone was trying to hold them down. i happen to look up toward the storm front approaching and saw an object slowly decend through a low cloud cover and hover. it was unaffected by the high winds and did not move. at first i thought it was a balloon or kite, but quickly realized that was impossible. after a minute or two, it slowly, and silently rose up through the cloud cover and disappeared. my son and i saw this, but everyone else was busy trying to secure their campsites. i've always been curious if this was reported by anyone else and/or have others had similar experiences.
content.summary: Large, silent black triangle

content.detailedDescription: My son (10 at the time)and i were at a boy scout jamboree/campout. it was held at the rutland state fairgrounds. during a storm, high winds started to uproot tents and everyone was trying to hold them down. i happen to look up toward the storm front approaching and saw an object slowly decend through a low cloud cover and hover. it was unaffected by the high winds and did not move. at first i thought it was a balloon or kite, but quickly realized that was impossible. after a minute or two, it slowly, and silently rose up through the cloud cover and disappeared. my son and i saw this, but everyone else was busy trying to secure their campsites. i've always been curious if this was reported by anyone else and/or have others had similar experiences.
content.summary: Large, silent black triangle
A man telephoned the colorado mufon hotline to report a dark object he described as having the appearance of two intertwined parachutes floating in the sky from north to south.

content.detailedDescription: My son (10 at the time)and i were at a boy scout jamboree/campout. it was held at the rutland state fairgrounds. during a storm, high winds started to uproot tents and everyone was trying to hold them down. i happen to look up toward the storm front approaching and saw an object slowly decend through a low cloud cover and hover. it was unaffected by the high winds and did not move. at first i thought it was a balloon or kite, but quickly realized that was impossible. after a minute or two, it slowly, and silently rose up through the cloud cover and disappeared. my son and i saw this, but everyone else was busy trying to secure their campsites. i've always been curious if this was reported by anyone else and/or have others had similar experiences.
content.summary: Large, silent black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a small town parade/fair when i noticed people pointing up at the sky.  everyone had stoped what they were doing and were getting their camera's and cell phone's out to take pictures.  it first looked like someone had taken a peice of a rainbow and just pasted it in that section of sky, but there was no reason for a rainbow at the time.  i know most people would look at a rainbow and say wow that's nice! this was completely different, no one knew what this was and there was no mistaking that. 
it had the colors of the light spectrum but unlike a rainbow that arks from one point on the ground to another point on the ground, this was a straight line in the sky with a few broken area's in the middle of a 2 mile band of red, green, yellow.  if i had to guess as to how high i would have to say between 5000 and 8000ft higher than the clouds but not by much ( whatever that might be ).
if i had to guess.....I might say it looked like a passenger jet had dumped its fuel.....Now, i have never seen a passenger jet dump its fuel......But it did look like fuel that had been spilled in water.....Kinda.  there is a lot of air traffic that comes over from sea tac but keep in mind they fly at somewhere around 30,000' and above, i would have to guess if one dumped or lost there fuel at that hight it would be finely disspersed? after a fall of 25,000 or so feet. i did finilly lost sight of it, but it didn't fall to the ground or move i just lost sight of it, it was just gone.

all i really want to know is if this is something that has been seen before?, i've lived around airports and air base's all my life..(malmstrom afb in great falls mt. whos seen it's share of the extremely uncommon!) suprizingly i've never had a good reason to write in to mufon before.
content.summary: Looked as though someone poured gasoline in water but this was in the sky. bright colors in the sky just above light clouds.

content.detailedDescription: When looking over a photo of "trails" left by planes on june 1,2006 in the morning i found this object.
content.summary: Object in trail left by plane

content.detailedDescription: I went outside thursday (6/1/06) morning around 8:30am and there were lots of chemtrails and some contrails overhead. i took a few shots of them just to look them over on the computer. in the upper left of this one there is an "unusually bright white" object that does not resemble an airplane to me. there is also a dim trail behind the object that stops a good way before the object therefore it doesn't seem to be left by the object. i am enclosing the original and an enlargement.
content.summary: Object among chemtrails-contrails

content.detailedDescription: Baghdad iraq.  humvee patrol.  saw 1 giant star.  thought it was very bright star.  scanned my area and then four bright lights were over a perpendicular highway.  2 lights were close. the other to were up and off to the sides.  they travelled without obvious motion.  as we reached the highway they hovered above.  they continued to travel over the highway in the opposite direction.  they never made any noise.  (very unlike helicopters which make noise and their motion is obvious).  there was an air force jet circling the area high above with his lights on.  after we moved away in the opposite direction i lost view of the objects.  then 2 jets crcled baghdad with lights on.  high above.  one jet moved away in the direction the lights went in.  the other jet circled for about an hour.  this is true and i will testify before congress if needed.  signed (victor lee pillow)  former active duty u.S. army sergeant (irr).  i was in the second cavalry attached to the first armor division.  my entire platoon (4 manned vehicles) saw this and 2 vehicles witnessed it from another location.  i was in the gunners hatch wich gave me an un-obstructed view.
content.summary: 4 lights looked like giant street lights

content.detailedDescription:
The following is an account of only the first of continual activity where i live...
i have a photo of this craft carrying the orb atop it..

i took my daughter and her friend across the street to the gulf of mexico for a "full-moon" photo..Upon getting to our beachwalk, the girl began yelling,,"what's that?"
over the water was a black shape..Seemed like a black-on-black type object..
back at the car, the battery unexplainably was dead..I began to just shoot pictures..
i used 20 aa  batteries and got 80 pics that first night..
since then, what has occurred here has been phenomenal..
now, however, the more i uncover, the more threats i am recieving..

i have photos of crafts, of orbs, of uav's used here(as if escort), of grids, of crop circles w/ entities, of an entity actually in my tv screen that was not turned on..
i have seen them use birds ..I have found hole after hole of bird feathers on the sand...No bird parts, but feathers...It just goes on..
now there are subtle threats..The morphing into the trees is taking a threatening position..They show me myu death in the form of being hunted..They have put my image into the cloud formation and shown me dead ..They have shown me entering a "pak-man" type pod..Deceased..
i had mib on me 5/11 after witnessing a lodged "craft" in treetop and how they dislodged it in 2 days..

it goes on and on..

i am told that i live on a portal, that there are indeed underground bases in the gulf of mexico...

i have tried to understand this stuff but it is not explainbable..Analytically, it is daily occurrance..
i am able to see through some sort of veil...
never was before, but that is the only explanation..

i have been fearful of sending photos as to reprecussion but now i feel that i bounght in to the intimidation by whomever and i am pissed off..So i will be glad to forward any supporting evidence that i have..

please respond
content.summary: At beach for photo of child..Suddenly, things appearing that could not be seen with the naked eye

content.detailedDescription: Just came home from a wrestling match. i ran into the house to open the windows, because the house got too hot, so i ran upstairs to open window. heard the sound of a cessna sized engine reving very high, but not going very fast. seconds later, aperfect grey oval, much larger that the size of a blimp, and'solidly fixed in space'flew silently behind the cessna. the oval was at least 70 yards long. flew about 500feet above me. on close inspection, the oval disapears, in cadence with the flickering of the whole body of the craft, then reapears. seen my witnesses from the next mornning's stockton record, our lodi news sentinnel failed to report. saw the same craft in successive years.72,73,74,75,76. the 1976 sighting was not reported by anyone. it was as though it was navigating by the confermation of the california basin. i did a painting.
content.summary: Luminescent oval, vector, east north easterly .No external features. in pursuit of small cessna, believed  crashed.

content.detailedDescription:
I will have to double check my calender but i'm sur it was monday 29th may (06), i was sat in my friends garden in mullumbimby having a cup of tea, reading a book.
i looked to the sky, not unusual for me, and was suprised to see a bright light darting about the sky, it seemed to hover and then move to a new position while in the process distorting.
i have always had a interest in ufo's so i was extatic, my heart raced and i did'nt want to leave my seat to go inside and get my camera, because i thought it would go when i was gone, but i got up and got it, managed to get one shot and the power went dead.
shortly after this the light floated up untill out of view.
i was left shocked and also disapointed that i only had one photo on a poor resolution camera.
content.summary: Sat in garden late morning, look up at sky and see a very bright light moving around, changing shape and hovering

content.detailedDescription:
On a summer night in 1983, in the backyard with my brother sky watching for meteors, we were shocked to see two pale luminous discs flying parallel out of the urban light haze in the west. the discs travelled side-by-side at an even pace (i assume at a reasonably low, but safe altitude, at speeds similar to a jet fighter traveling a light cruising speed), along an eastward line almost directly over our home. as the two discs passed over, without interrupting their pacing or flight-path, each disc switched place with the other in a very precise, mechanical and deliberate fashion as they continued past. as i was running after them, i watched the discs switch places again before i lost sight of them in the urban haze of the east. the discs made no sound, and had no surface details. to my perspective, each disc was sized similarly to that of a lense-cap one foot from my eye. the total time of the experience was less than a minute.

i have had only a mild interest for the subject of ufos, but i consider he event one of the most special events in my life. i have the pleasure of knowing with complete certainty that this phenomenon exists.
content.summary: Two discs flying parallel, twice switching sides within the period of obversation

content.detailedDescription: I was 13 years old (i'm now 51). a friend and myself were at the local elementary school playing with our motorized gas engine cars.  the sky was partly cloudy and the ceiling was low. it was around 3pm.  we had stopped to refuel. i didn't hear anything, but i just happened to glance up to see this oval shapped disc with caddilac fins in the back going in to a cloud. it was slightly angled and i could see an aluminum looking box between the fins. in fact the whole thing was shiny like metal.  it was just a few seconds and it was gone.  my friend did not see it.  i didn't know what to think it was at first.  there was not any airplane noise or helicopter noise.  it was forward moving.
content.summary: I was at the basketball court racing motorized cars, it was a partly cloudy day. i just happened to look up to see this disc with "caddy fins" in the back shooting through the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: I always look into the stars, one night i looked past the stars, i saw a moving lighted object, it approached what to me looked like a star and it stoped, as it stoped another took off. the other went in a different direction. steady, fast, but not much faster than a plane. we are talking, i was seeing a pattern of movement. these things were on a mission. i tried to rule out well it was the space station or other things but these objects were as far up with the stars, making landing and taking on a pattern such as ants soldier ants would move. i called my father in law the second night and pretty soon it became a nightly thing for my family to come to my driveway wand watch them work. this went on for a couple of months. i just thought that someone would report it, i did not know who to contact. i have many witness's, this was wow. i am still blown away. i do guess some people have to be tought to look past the stars, not at them. this has stayed with my family, airliners would pass and it did show just how far away these things were, and they did land on certian   3  different stars, they were on a mission, working. please let this information be known. i need to know if anyone else saw this. it only went on for about 3 months, it slowed and quit. please let me know, i saw a clip on msnbc lastnight, 06/01/06 about your agency and and feel a great since of relief to have told someone.
content.summary: Star like- fast-steady-direct-busy

content.detailedDescription: Was involved with a military aircraft mishap in the nm desert.  while setting up tents noticed bright light about 3 miles away near small runway.  runway lights turned on the bright light appeared to be coming in for a landing. the light stopped over the runway hovering for several minutes.  no sound coming from light, no prop or rotor wash.  the light then accelerated very rapidly upward at a 90 degree angle from the runway.  again no sound.  the runway lights turned off.  there were 10-15 people that saw this.  we didn't discuss it with anyone, we all knew better than to report it.  all of the people that witnessed the event were on active military duty.
content.summary: Bright light in night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was helping a friend with some yard work by holding a garden hose to put out any fires while he used the grinder to remove some old bolts from a length of fence in his large lot. this gave myself time to watch the sky and at 5:14 pm while looking south and scanning to the east i saw this object approching at a high rate of speed about 1500 to 2000 feet up. i called for my friend to look but he was between some pine trees and the fence and could not hear me over the grinder so did not see it. the object was moving against the wind. it was a clear/slightly cloudy day. i only managed to get one picture and my memory card was full. camera was at 3x optical zoom
content.summary: Disc moving in a vertical position across sky, no sound

content.detailedDescription:
My wife brought it to my attention...
looks very similar to many pictures i have seen...
saturn like shape...Seems to be moving quickly from shot
with a downward trajectory.
you guys will know better then me.
content.summary: Picture went innoticed...The wife found it.
I saw something with many colored lights hovering over eastern downtown denver.

content.detailedDescription:
Watched it on  balcony around 1100pm at palm island fl.Lasted around a minute. pointed it out to friend,he said it was mars then it moved, i said well does mars move like that!He said no and we watched.Red glowing changed colors several times.,kept moving south- west of my view.Started to glow and chage colors)cant remeber the colors it changed to.But i know it started off red(mars).Never forget it!Then it was gone.Hope this helps.

ps distance from the balcony was probably a few miles mayme 5,over the gulf of mexico.
content.summary: Was watching w/ friend ,asked what it was he said mars.

content.detailedDescription: This object is quite some distance away but when enlarged looking through the blur it looks to be a somewhat long and a little thin. it was a random shot and i did not see the object before i took the picture. when downloaded in the computer it was visible. i was in the field in front of my house when i took the picture.
content.summary: Object at some didtance in front of cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I never forgot this-at drive-in w boyfriend, i was looking up at the dome of the former penn military academy (pmc), in the sky above the dome i saw a yellow, red,  glowing object, i knew it was not normal at the time, by the time my boyfriend turned to look it was gone. vague, but i think it disappeared.
  i was upset, plus no one believed me.  i went away w parents the next day to the poconos-no tv, listening to a radio i remember hearing people had seen a yellow redish glowing object.  which confirmed my sighting.  i was young (age 16), now i'm 53 and i can say with no doubt, i saw this object, whatever it was.  thanks for listening. saw you on msnbc tonight.
content.summary: Yellow, red glowing object in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch of the fishermans motel just east of ore city texas. i had my 9 month old daughter outside with me. when out of the treetops to our south a huge glowing object appeared. this object was as big as the motel that we were staying in. it put off a glow as if lights were on but emitted none to the ground. the object as bright as ir seemed did not illuminate anything, maybe it was higher than it appeared to be. this object was going to the north in a somewhat quick pace, but not fast. it tracked right down the path of the boat landing which gave me the opportunity to try to gauge its size , by way of the tree lines on both sides of the boat ramp access road. it completely encompassed the roadway and then some. this object made no sound. it continued north accross the lake and then dissappeared from my sight due to elevation problems. it was by far the stangest thing i had ever witnesed for the mid 70"s time era. i felt in awe of this object by its eminsity and the unkown feeling of what had just happened
content.summary: Huge round glowing , no sound and low altitude

content.detailedDescription: I was outside my cousin's apartment in selden, ny with a clear night stargazing (as usual), when i noticed three perfectly equidistant stars. i stared at them for a few minutes, and then the first star started heading south at a decent speed. as the first star moved south, the second nearest star took off and caught up to the first, then both moved as a pair toward the horizon. i then looked at the third star, but it never moved. this is now my third reported sighting to mufon, and i feel priviledged to have seen this many unusual occurences.
content.summary: I saw three stars equidistant and not moving for a few minutes when the first star headed south, followed by the second star. the last star did not move

content.detailedDescription: I was about 25 years old and was meeting my brother in law and brother outside a buisness establishment. it was dark and the sky was full of stars. as i was walking towards them i was looking into the sky at all the stars reflecting on how prety they were , then i noticed something moving. it was moving rather slowly , and appeared to be at a great height as it seemed to be as small as a marble. it appeared to be round but all i could see was a bright light much as the stars emit. it proceeded on its path and then suddenly stopped , thats when i noticed it had joined 3 more objects in identical size and visability. these four objects at that time looked as if you placed 4 dots in pairs of two one below the other. the objects suspended motionless for about 30 seconds , they then all moved at the same time and proceeded to the south from my viewpoint. these four objects emitted no noise,they moved in a constant speed of which i had no determination due to their seemingly high altitude. these objects kept their formation in rows of two one below the other and then suddenly just vanished. i had called their attention to my group there, after they disappeared we commented , what the heck was that. then just shrugged it off and continued our visit
content.summary: One object moving,joining 3 more,then all moving

content.detailedDescription:
I was out one dark night around midnight, rollerblading with my father. we went out to the country because this night there was supposed to be meteor showers(and it's easier to see the sky in the country). it was slightly cloudy, but i saw something which at first i thought was a meteor, frmo very far away. it looked like a orange planet, but it was moving up and down and left and right and every which way, on a dime. i said "look dad!!" as it went behind a cloud and he thought i was screwing around. thinking i would never see this strange thing again, suddenly it came out from the cloud, and was making sparatic movement which my father was stunned by. it was coming closer and closer, and before we knew it, it was maybe 40 feet above us, and 50 feet away. it was in the shape of a triangle with a flat top and flat bottom...It was a pure metal color, and i could see it so clearly. i felt strange, and felt in a daze, then suddenly it took off instantly, many seconds later, an extremely loud engine type sound was heard. without saying a word to my father, we both stared in stock and sat on the ground silently for many minutes. "noone needs to know about this" was the first thing my father said.

i am far from crazy and i am 100% sure of what i saw. what pisses me off most is when i tell this story to someone and they act like they know better, saying "i believe you think you saw something, i just believe you were mistaken". my dad is an honorable man, and so am i.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flew about 50-100 feet above my head and my fathers, hovered, then took off at a fast pace

content.detailedDescription:
It was during the summer because i was off of school and i was riding my bike. i was turning the corner of my block and going down the road from my house which was about a distance of 800 feet or so. as i rode down the street i was looking at the houses next time mine and saw a green light hovering over a very large ficus tree behind my house. i quickly stopped about 4 houses from my house to stare at it so i could get a good fixated view of what it could be. it quickly rose then did several figure 8's in a horizontal motion. it quickly stopped on the opposite side from where i first saw it. it then quickly retreated behind the large ficus tree. i quickly, out of shock, yelled a "what the hell" and continued to ride down the street to see if anyone had seen it. no one did. if anyone saw this i would be most appreciated of your response. the area it was over was called princeton - a small rural area outside homestead, fl city limits. email me @ ancient9@gmail.Com

comments, complaints, questions are all welcomed. please feel free
content.summary: Green burning ball doing several figure 8's

content.detailedDescription: I was maybe a half mile off state hwy 160 in the valley below mt potosi after dark snake hunting.. taking a break i looked west up at mt potosi and something caught my eye a little south of the mountain... i couldn't see stars.. something was blocking my view,,, i then realized a dark disc shape... " larger than a football field moving slowly from south to north was blocking my view. as it passed over me.. (i'd say it was around 3000 feet above me using potosi as a guide...) i could see stars outlining the edge of the object. there were no lights.. no sounds... total silence with the exception of cars in the distance on hwy 160.. it crossed over the 160... stopped and then retraced it's movement then turning directly west and disappearing over the south side of mt potosi. absolutely amazing... no way was it a weather ballon... this has silent power and could stop.. reverse and turn... made my night,,
content.summary: Large dark disc no lights, slow moving... size of football field,

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back home from a late night @ work. i was on highway 510 in puyallup when i saw a small dot in the southern sky. it was changing from red to blue. i thought it might be some kind of plain from macord air force base in tacoma, washington. i pulled over to the side of the road, and as i stepped out of my truck a smaller red dot dropped from the bottom of the larger dot. the smaller dot took of to the east and i lost track of it. and then i looked for the bigger dot and it was gone.
content.summary: small dot with multiple colors
